response.job_title: Civil Engineer & Geotechnical Engineer | Data Scientist & Data Analyst
response.summary: Civil engineer and candidate for a Master's degree in geotechnical engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia. Professional experience on buildings construction and foundations (shallow and deep foundations), and infraestructure projects in site. Knowledge and strong skills on programming, numerical modeling of engineering problems (Finite Element Method, Finite Differences Method and Material Point Method).  Passionate about statistics, data science, and Machine Learning. Strong knowledge of Python, R, Matlab, SQL and Linux.
response.skills: Machine learning, Ciencia de datos, Project Estimation, Project Planning, Construction Management, AutoCAD, Data Analysis, Microsoft Project, Civil Engineering, Construction Engineering, Python (Programming Language)

profile_positions.description: Construction engineer for the execution of the foundation project of the wells for screening and pumping of Rio Bogota's sewage water at the Canoas Elevator Station (Soacha - Colombia). Client: Mota-Engil - EAAB.  Technical and production control construction activities. Supervising personnel, and construction materials on site.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for technical and production control for the reparation and intervention process in foundation projects at the post-sales area.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for technical and production control for the execution of retaining walls in the extension of a road (Carrera 43 - Barranquilla). Client: Mota-Engil. Execution of pre-excavated retaining walls to stabilize the slopes and embankments on site. Supervising construction activities, monitoring budget control, contracts with subcontractors, personnel control.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for technical and production control for the contact and consolidation grout injections construction in the Ituango hydroelectric project's dam (Client Consorcio CCC - CONCONCRETO CAMARGO CORREA - CONINSA RAMON H). Excavation control, quality control for bentonite fluid and plastic grout. Preparation of technical production reports, control of construction personnel, preparation of technical sheets, and construction reports.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for technical and production control for the construction of a plastic wall in the dam of Ituango hydroelectric (Client Consorcio CCC - CONCONCRETO CAMARGO CORREA - CONINSA RAMON H). Excavation control, quality control for bentonite fluid and plastic grout. Preparation of technical production reports, control of construction personnel, preparation of technical sheets, and construction reports.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for technical and production control for the pre-excavated foundation (piles, retaining walls) of the Seventh Avenue project (Client Arquitectura y Concreto - Calle 159 # 7-61 - Bogotá). Management of personnel, financial resources, and construction materials on site. Preparation of weekly production reports and resumes of contracts with suppliers and subcontractors, payments with clients, and compliance with the building schedule at contractual times.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description: Technical and production control for the pre-excavated foundation, piles, and retaining perimeter walls of the building 84 project (Calle 84 No 7-27 - Bogotá). Top-Down construction system in the foundation. Management and control of construction materials, quality plans, monitoring, and traceability of the building and production reports.
profile_positions.title: Internship Trainee

profile_positions.description: Intern in the Sustainable Urban Mobility Unit of the Ministry of Transport. Technical support in the monitoring and accompaniment of the structuring and implementation of the massive and strategic transport systems SETP - SITM in the cities of Popayán, Sincelejo, Soacha, and Valle de Aburrá.
profile_positions.title: Internship Trainee

school.name: Data Science for All by Correlation One

company.name: INGETEC
company.description:
INGETEC está conformado por un grupo de profesionales con alto nivel de especialización, quienes trabajan dentro de las diferentes gerencias y divisiones que componen la organización: Gerencia General, Gerencia de Interventoría, Gerencia de Proyectos, Gerencia Administrativa y Financiera y Gerencia Técnica, la cual a su vez se subdivide en las siguientes Divisiones: Recursos Hídricos, Ambiental, Estructuras, Geotecnia, Vías, Tránsito y Transporte, Eléctrica y Electrónica, Mecánica e Industrial.

La firma cuenta con amplia experiencia en diseño, asesoría y supervisión de proyectos hidroeléctricos y termoeléctricos, líneas de transmisión y subestaciones eléctricas, transporte, disposición de aguas servidas, distritos de riego, carreteras (incluyendo túneles, puentes y viaductos), transporte masivo (metro, buses articulados), estudios ambientales y sociales, desarrollos industriales, entre otros, con liderazgo destacado en diseño de presas, túneles, cavernas y pozos profundos de gran diámetro.
